name: Blobs & Bridges
description:
We accidentally left a test build in the game download. The intended submission is the file "Blobs & Bridges.exe".

Blobs & Bridges is a strategy game based around making connections with bridges, and moving attacker pieces using those bridges. The goal of the game is to capture all of the nodes (circles) on the map. 

Credits:

Camden Cecrle (Art)

Alex Cecrle (Programming)

Jonathan Miller (Programming)

Jack Wilken (Menu song)
